metadata.name: Duality of the Devil
metadata.description:
He's a ruler and he's a follower, he's feared and he's loved, he's cruel and he's graceful, he's wild and he's royal. His eyes are eyes of vengeance and his eyes are eyes of innocence. 

This art work symbolizes the beauty of polarities that we all posses, everyone has kind and ferocious forces working within them. Innocence and Cruelty, Beauty and Beast, Dark and Light. The balance between these forces enhances the beauty of life and so as of this art piece.

Medium : Pencil on paper( just a single pencil)
Size : A3 (29.7 Ã— 42) cm
Time taken : 85+ hours
